item.title: Command Prompt: Basic Commands You Should Know (cmd)
item.description: In Windows, when you open a command prompt, almost always the program that is running is cmd.exe. It’s an enhanced NT derivative of the old DOS-based command.com, which is in turn has similarites with the even older CP/M CCP command interpreter.
